original_text: You cannot make the stars of the Pleiades stay in their places. You cannot change the shape of Orion. You cannot make the stars of the Pleiades stay in their places. You cannot change the shape of Orion. You cannot make the stars of the Pleiades stay in their places. You cannot change the shape of Orion. You cannot make the stars of the Pleiades stay in their places.
korean_text: 네가 묘성을 매어 묶을 수 있으며 삼성의 띠를 풀 수 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: You cannot make the stars of the Pleiades stay in their places.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 플레이아데스 별들이 그 자리에 머물게 할 수 없다.

sentences.original_text: You cannot change the shape of Orion.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 오리온의 형태를 바꿀 수 없다.
